import React, { Component } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { selectOption } from './TestAction' import './Test.css' import { Container, Card, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' var CardBack = require('../test/cards-back.png'); class Test extends Component { handleOptionChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); this.props.user.marksObtained = this.props.user.answer === event.target.value ? this.props.user.marksObtained + 1 : this.props.user.marksObtained this.props.user.selectedOPtion = event.target.value this.props.selectOption(this.props.user) } handleFormSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); } render() { console.log(this.props.user) const { school, option1, option2, option3, option4, selectedOPtion, problem, answer, maxMarks } = this.props.user return (


) } } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { user: state.test } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { selectOption: (user) => dispatch(selectOption(user)) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Test)
